DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare different type rehabilitation coronary bypass surgery . The investigator wish compare rehabilitation institution four week home base rehabilitation . They also wish compare rehabilitation institution four week rehabilitation program patient live home visit hospital twice week twelve week . The investigator measure patient ' physical capacity measure maximal oxygen consumption . The investigator also analyze blood endothelian function ( well artery dilate ) .
DOC.brief_title: Rehabilitation After Coronary Bypass Grafting . Comparison Different Types Rehabilitation Programs
DOC.criteria: Coronary artery bypass Significant lung disease Drug abuse Pregnancy Major physical impairment
